name: ART-ER Società Consortile per Azioni
membership:
ART-ER is a member of the following organisations:
http://www.aster.it/en/national-and-international-networks
goal:
ART-ER is the Consortium for innovation and technology transfer of Emilia-Romagna. Its partners are the Emilia-Romagna Regional Government, the six Universities and the National Research Centres located in the region (the National Research Council-CNR, the Italian National Agency for New Technologies, Energy and Sustainable Economic Development-ENEA, the National Institute for Nuclear Physics-INFN), the Regional Union of Chambers of Commerce, working in collaboration with regional Business Associations and Innovation Centres.

Our mission is to build the regional innovation system by launching shared actions, projects and collaborations for integrated innovation of industry, human capital, society and territory intervening on growth and competitiveness, talent and entrepreneuship, cohesion and participation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Cornerstone of ART-ER activity, project design and development is the key to develop new strategic initiatives, exploit excellence areas, strengthen regional assets, explore new opportunities and undertake pilot actions to increase innovation capacity and competitiveness of the regional research and business systems.

This activity is based on the collaboration with regional, national and European research and innovation stakeholders, partner regions and other organisations sharing objectives and ambitions to innovate and improve regional performances.
